thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Carol Clarke

author: Carol Clarke
title: Carol Clarke
text: I ordered this buggy for my 9 month old baby girl. I needed a lightweight buggy to get her to and from nursery and to get her our and about on my own. I am delighted with my purchase and highly recommend it!! The colours are fab, it is light, compact but also sturdy enough for every day use. Cannot fault this product and I also love the matching items (footmugg, changing bag etc). Great buy....and a great price too!!!
